alert.note: Alert for Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 10:31AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Woodward County through 1100 AM CDT... At 1028 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tangier, moving northeast at 5 mph. Other storms were located about 3 miles north of Woodward and between Mooreland and Quinlan. The slow moving storms will produce gusty winds and locally heavy rainfall. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Woodward, Mooreland, and Tangier. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
